title: Help Me ..!!
content: Currently Im in Sem 3, i scored 66/200 in ISA 1 .  How should i study to get atleast B grade in all subjects?

comments.body: Whatever branch u may be in, u should start attending all the classes(in case if u r not attending regularly), try to be as productive as possible in class, and learn most of the things in class itself. Start studying from 2 weeks before the isa.  The reason why we don't perform well is because we think we can learn the entire chapter just before the isa....

honestly just doing the slides is mostly enough, and whatever you don't understand with the slides you can easily find videos on the topic on YouTube. Know what the syllabus is, learn, and practice answering from mcqs and qb from pesuacademy. ez 9 gpa
Did slides but i lost in MCQs
